content.text: I am doing okay. I just finished hiking in the woods with my brother.
Oh my gosh, that sounds like fun! Where did you go hiking?
We hiked on a trail called the Appalachian Trail near the Appalachian Mountains.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I have always wanted to go hiking in the woods but I have never had the chance.
Well I highly recommend it! It's really fun and a great way to get exercise.
I will definitely have to try it sometime! What are you doing now?
I am actually studying for my master's degree. I am working on my thesis.
Oh wow! That's a lot of work! What are you studying?
I am studying business administration. I want to get my MBA after I graduate.
That's awesome! I am sure you will do great! I am an avid reader so I love to read business books.
Oh that's awesome! I love to read books too but I don't get to read as much as I would like.
What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read mostly non-fiction books. I love to learn new things.
That's great! I love to learn new things too. I am a big fan of self-help books.
Oh I love those too! They're so motivating.
I know right! They can really help you change your life for the better
